docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: There is hope for cigarette smokers who feel increasingly victimized, misunderstood or at the mercy of their tobacco habit. Health professionals and nonsmokers are being urged to see smokers in a more sympathetic and constructive light in the wake of the Surgeon General's recent report declaring nicotine to be an addictive drug that quickly turns most users into abusers.
